text: int max ( int a , int b ) { return a > b ? a : b ; } int main ( void ) { int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , i , j , m , n , t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i + 1 ; j ++ ) a [ i ] [ j ] = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j < i ; j ++ ) { if ( i && j ) a [ i ] [ j ] += max ( a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] , a [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] ) ; if ( i && ! j ) a [ i ] [ j ] += a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ; } m = a [ n - 1 ] [ 0 ] ; for ( j = 1 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { if ( a [ n - 1 ] [ j ] > m ) m = a [ n - 1 ] [ j ] ; } printf ( "%d\n" , m ) ; } return 0 ; }
